body:
On 2010-03-23 14:37:38 -0700, Thomas Bleicher said:
> It is still a csh script so it's no use for Windows (although at some
> point I considered rewriting the whole thing in Python. I am really
> not a csh man ...)


I've been thinking about that for a while, too. Maybe, now that you've 
got this far, I'll be persuaded to get off my duff.


Randolph Fritz
